sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  

export default ({components, ...props}) => <MDXTag name="wrapper"  components={components}><MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"syntax-highlighting"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h1" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#syntax-highlighting"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`Syntax highlighting`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`We’ve created the following packages to help you understand `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`.view`}</MDXTag>{` files better:`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"http://atom.io/packages/language-views"}}>{`Atom`}</MDXTag>{`,`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"https://github.com/viewstools/syntax-sublime"}}>{`Sublime`}</MDXTag>{`,`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"https://github.com/viewstools/syntax-vim"}}>{`VIM`}</MDXTag>{`, and`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=uxtemple.views"}}>{`VSCode`}</MDXTag>{`.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`We currently highlight block names, numbers, props, and strings. Our highlighters
aren’t perfect, but they should get us started. Feel free to submit fixes and suggestions!`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`If you’re using other editors and come up with a syntax highlighter for it, reach out,
and we’ll add it to this list.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Happy editing!`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Reach out with questions via our `}<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"href":"https://slack.viewsdx.com/"}}>{`Slack Questions Channel`}</MDXTag>{`.
Mention `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`@tom`}</MDXTag>{` or `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`@dario`}</MDXTag>{` to make sure that we get your notifications.`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
